channel.title: CVE Feed for Milestone Systems -- XProtect VMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Milestone Systems -- XProtect VMS

item.title: CVE-2024-3506|2024-10-08T13:50:58.073Z -- milestone%20systems -- xprotect%20vms
item.description: A possible buffer overflow in selected cameras' drivers from XProtect Device Pack can allow an attacker with access to internal network to execute commands on Recording Server under strict conditions.
